message: I propose a 95/5 split.  It's a fair starting point, and I think we can both do well with this arrangement.
I think we can do better than that. I'm willing to give you a decent chunk, but I'm not going to give away too much.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40. This way, we both get a good amount and avoid further rounds of negotiation.
I'm not going to give up much more. I think 90% is a fair share, considering the initial proposal was 5% for me.
I'm willing to go down to 40% to avoid further rounds and ensure we both get something. I'm hoping we can find a mutually agreeable solution before the inflation hurts us further.
